General.Name: Arbor Technology
General.Description: ARBOR Technology Corp. provides industrial IoT computing and mobility solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It provides embedded computing products, including computer on modules, PC/104 and PC/104+ CPU Modules, single board computers, slot computing boards, industrial motherboards, chassis/backplane/power supply products, and accessories. The company also offers rugged mobile computing products, such as handheld devices, tablets, and panels; medical computing products comprising medical stations, such as touch panels; patient infotainment and monitoring terminals; healthcare IoT devices; and mobile clinical assistant tablet PC. In addition, it provides industrial automation products, such as IoT devices, intelligent power system, digital signage, slim panel and heavy-duty panel PC products, human machine interface, factory automation, transportation, and accessories. Further, the company offers solutions for healthcare, logistics, transportation, industrial automation, industrial safety, and retail sectors. ARBOR Technology Corp. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 700, Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
